db.description: Settings for connecting to the Postgres database.

dsn.description: Connection Data Source Name (DSN). The database name MUST NOT be included.

loglevel.description: Log level considered exclusively for database operations.

faktory.description: Settings for connecting to Faktory and general properties for the workers.

url.description: Faktory URL, internally exposed as environment variable FAKTORY_URL.

queues.description: List of queues in order of precedence. This value is passed to Manager.ProcessStrictPriorityQueues().
